WRITING.TITLE: Crossposs from /r/travel - Thinking of travelling/working in Thailand, advise needed
WRITING.TEXT: Hi guys my girlfriend has recently been given a conservation job in Thailand. I am hoping to join her maybe for as much as a year. I would like to travel a bit as well as some local employment to keep funds going. I've looked into visa's and work permits but it seems a little confusing and would like a little advise on it. I am a British citizen.
